mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (btitle, bcontent, bwriter) values(#{btitle},#{bcontent},#{bwriter})
mapper.select: select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
select bno, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, regdate, viewcnt, replycnt from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from tbl_board where bno > 0

select * from tbl_board where bno > 0
order by bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(bno) from tbl_board where bno > 0
mapper.update: update tbl_board set replycnt = replycnt + #{amount} where bno = #{bno}
update tbl_board set viewcnt = viewcnt +1 where bno = #{bno}
